Courtside.Description: Elite seating offering the closest view of the action, providing an immersive game day experience.
Courtside.View_Quality: Direct view at court level, offering the most engaging and dynamic experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunities for direct interactions with players, visibility on live broadcasts.
Courtside.Accessibility: Priority access with some limitations for personal mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to VIP clubs, complimentary gourmet dining, and personalized services.

Club Level.Description: Premium seating offering a fantastic view of the game from an elevated perspective, with added benefits.
Club Level.View_Quality: Elevated and central views ensuring a perfect sightline to the court.
Club Level.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating with additional legroom, less crowded for a more exclusive experience.
Club Level.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, with nearby elevators and restrooms.
Club Level.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive lounges, gourmet dining options, and in-seat service.

Upper Level.Description: A budget-friendly option that offers a bird's-eye view of the game, capturing the entire court.
Upper Level.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the court, ideal for fans who appreciate the game from a higher vantage point.
Upper Level.Unique_Features: An affordable way to enjoy the excitement of Rockets basketball.
Upper Level.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, with escalators and elevators to the upper levels.
Upper Level.Special_Perks: Cost-effective, with access to standard arena amenities.

Suite Level.Description: Luxurious private suites offering a blend of exclusivity and comfort with a premier view of the game.
Suite Level.View_Quality: Private and elevated viewing experience with unmatched sightlines to the court.
Suite Level.Unique_Features: Suites equipped with plush seating, private restrooms, and customizable catering options.
Suite Level.Accessibility: Exclusive access points with private elevators, ensuring ease of movement.
Suite Level.Special_Perks: Personalized service, access to exclusive clubs, and priority booking for events.

restaurants_bars.name: The Rustic
restaurants_bars.description: A lively spot with a backyard feel offering farm-to-table meals, live music, and a large selection of craft beers.

restaurants_bars.name: Huynh Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: Family-owned eatery serving homestyle Vietnamese dishes in a cozy and welcoming atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: Pappasitos Cantina
restaurants_bars.description: A Tex-Mex favorite known for its lively ambiance and margaritas, located conveniently inside the Toyota Center.

restaurants_bars.name: Xochi
restaurants_bars.description: Celebrated chef Hugo Ortega's outlet serving inventive Oaxacan cuisine in a sophisticated setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Franks Pizza
restaurants_bars.description: Downtown pizzeria offering late-night slices and whole pies in a casual setting, perfect for post-game cravings.

restaurants_bars.name: Kulture
restaurants_bars.address: 701 Avenida de las Americas, Houston, TX 77010
restaurants_bars.description: An urban comfort kitchen serving a creative take on Southern and Caribbean flavors near Discovery Green.

accommodations.name: Hilton Americas-Houston
accommodations.description: Upscale hotel with a skybridge to Toyota Center, featuring modern rooms, a spa, and an Olympic-sized pool.

accommodations.name: Hotel Alessandra
accommodations.description: Luxury boutique hotel offering elegant accommodations, fine dining, and a rooftop pool with city views.

accommodations.name: Marriott Marquis Houston
accommodations.description: This hotel features a Texas-shaped rooftop lazy river, extensive meeting space, and multiple dining options.

accommodations.name: The Westin Houston Downtown
accommodations.description: Opposite Minute Maid Park, this hotel offers upscale accommodations with convenient access to Houston's sports venues.

accommodations.name: Hampton Inn Houston-Downtown
accommodations.description: Affordable and comfortable, with free breakfast and an outdoor pool, located close to Toyota Center and other attractions.

accommodations.name: Four Seasons Hotel Houston
accommodations.description: Five-star luxury hotel in downtown Houston, featuring a spa, fine dining, and elegantly appointed rooms.

tourist_attractions.name: Discovery Green
tourist_attractions.description: An urban park in downtown Houston, providing green space, a lake, playgrounds, and public art installations.

tourist_attractions.name: Houston Museum of Natural Science
tourist_attractions.description: A science museum that features a planetarium, butterfly center, and a wide array of exhibits on natural science topics.

tourist_attractions.name: Space Center Houston
tourist_attractions.description: The Official Visitor Center of NASA Johnson Space Center, this is a must-visit for space enthusiasts, offering tram tours of the space center and numerous exhibits.

tourist_attractions.name: The Menil Collection
tourist_attractions.description: A museum housing the private art collection of founders John and Dominique de Menil, featuring works from antiquity to the twentieth century.

tourist_attractions.name: Houston Zoo
tourist_attractions.description: Located in Hermann Park, the Houston Zoo is home to thousands of exotic animals from around the world.

tourist_attractions.name: Buffalo Bayou Park
tourist_attractions.address: 1800 Allen Pkwy & Memorial Dr, Houston, TX 77019
tourist_attractions.description: A sprawling urban park featuring scenic views, walking and biking trails, dog parks, and kayak rentals along Buffalo Bayou.

team_related_activities.name: Rockets Shop
team_related_activities.description: Official store for Houston Rockets merchandise, offering a wide range of apparel and accessories.

team_related_activities.name: Toyota Center Tours
team_related_activities.description: Guided tours of the Toyota Center, providing fans with a behind-the-scenes look at the Rockets' home arena, including the locker rooms, luxury suites, and the court itself.

team_related_activities.name: Rockets Fan Events
team_related_activities.description: Throughout the year, the Houston Rockets host various fan events, including meet-and-greets with players, autograph signings, and community outreach activities, offering fans unique opportunities to interact with the team.

team_related_activities.name: Game Night Entertainment
team_related_activities.description: Experience the excitement of a Rockets game night with live entertainment, including performances by the Rockets Power Dancers, Clutch the Bear mascot shows, and fan participation games.

options.description: The Red Line offers service to the Toyota Center, with the nearest station being the Convention District Station, providing easy access from various parts of the city.
Several METRO bus lines serve the downtown area, with stops near the Toyota Center, facilitating access from wider areas.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Rockets tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Rockets tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
